body:
> I think the page could be replaced more or less with a single line of
> GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build hello.go

The command above will silently rebuild most of standard library unless you already installed all windows-amd64 standard packages with
```
GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go install
```
first. So `GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build hello.go` will run much slower than it need be.

Alex
